V_SPHERE_TAB.TITLE: Not protected by Zerto
V_SPHERE_TAB.TO_PROTECT_VM: To protect this VM, add it to a VPG.
V_SPHERE_TAB.TO_PROTECT_VAPP: To protect this vApp, create a VPG.
V_SPHERE_TAB.VPG_DESCRIPTION: A Virtual Protection Group (VPG) is a set of related VMs that are replicated to a recovery site. VPGs can be configured to meet your replication needs.
